entry.title: Monday night: A few clouds. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning.
entry.summary: A few clouds. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 3 with temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 5 this evening. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday: Chance of showers. High 6. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Increasing cloudiness late in the morning then 30 percent chance of showers late in the afternoon. High 6. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023

entry.title: Tuesday night: Rain or snow. Low minus 6.
entry.summary: Rain changing to snow mixed with rain near midnight. Local snowfall amount 2 to 4 cm. Wind becoming north 30 km/h gusting to 50 before morning. Low minus 6. Wind chill minus 12 overnight. Forecast issued 4:00 PM EST Monday 13 February 2023
